projects.title: Linux Cybersecurity Scripts
projects.description: Shell scripts designed to improve Ubuntu and Debian system security by automating best practices.

projects.title: HEB Grocer New Online Deli Shop
projects.description: I developed and designed a prototype to improve HEBâ€™s online deli shop by introducing new interactive features and providing more product details by constructing a database with relevant cheese product information.

projects.title: EduMedia Mobile Application
projects.description: EduMedia is a cross-platform mobile application that connects students, parents, and educators by offering a platform to meet everyone's school-related needs. Communicate with teachers quickly using our live chat feature, browse offered clubs, view upcoming events, post pictures to school/club-wide galleries and so much more! (Made for IOS & Android)

projects.title: Central Texas Tourism Recs
projects.description: This is your one stop site for finding fun things to do in Central Texas! You can utilize this application in order to find dining, rich history, wonder in the great outdoors, and so much more!

projects.title: CEB Cryptography Simulator
projects.description: AutumnHacks International Hackathon 1st Place Winner! The website is designed as a cryptography simulator so students can understand the inner works of different ciphers and hashing methods.

aboutpara: I'm interested in understanding and solving digital challenges. My journey started with programming and quickly advanced to exploring algorithms, data structures, and software development. I've improved my skills through self-study, online courses, and participating in coding competitions. My goal is to contribute to pursue a career in computer science and cybersecurity!
